mapper.insert:

mapper.update: update userinfo set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headPicture = #{headpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, achievement = #{achievement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, socre = #{socre,jdbcType=REAL}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER} where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select userId, username, headPicture, email, `password`, phone, `status`, `type`, achievement, socre, `level` from userinfo where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
